title: Ben Neequaye
text:
Ben Neequaye (22 August 1980 – 2006) was a Ghanaian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202000%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a>.
As a professional he won the West African Boxing Union (WABU) <a href="lightweight">lightweight</a> title.
